trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Thon An would entrust you with a map.
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_TODO_00<tab>Search for the piece of evidence in the vicinity of Deepwood Swim.
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the Voeburtite lockbox to Thon An.

TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_001<tab>Ah, a traveler comes who has the air of dependability about <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>. Look upon this map, if you will. It belonged to my master, a knight of Voeburt, and it points to a piece of evidence in a matter that he was investigating.

TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_002<tab>Alas, my master is long dead, and the place indicated upon the map lies drowned beneath Longmirror Lake. We amaro are not made for the water and I am unable to reach this place. If you consider yourself a strong swimmer, will you not search in my stead?
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_003<tab>I am in your debt. The place you seek is in the vicinity of Deepwood Swim. Please dive down there and see what you find.
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_004<tab>The place you seek is in the vicinity of Deepwood Swim. Please dive down there and see what you find.
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_020<tab>Ah, you are returned. Were you able to find anything?
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_021<tab>Hmmm, an ordinary lockbox at a glance. Perhaps the evidence is within. I have not the appendages with which to open it, so please do the honors.
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>With a little exertion, the lid comes loose to reveal a piece of parchment, timeworn but miraculously untouched by water. The contents can clearly be made out.

TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_023<tab>This is a letter, bearing the symbol of Voeburt's royal mages and addressed to a noble house. A house aligned with the faction that sought to usurp the crown...
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_024<tab>It seems that the mages were in league with the insurgents. Had my master seen this, he would have stopped at nothing to bring them all to justice.
TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_025<tab>However, all was rendered moot by the Flood. My master, the traitors, the kingdom itself─all are no more.

TEXT_LUCKZD202_03432_THONAN_000_026<tab>Yet in retrieving this letter, you have brought my master the closure that had long eluded him. He may rest easier now, I believe. My thanks for your kind service.
